process.title: How Our Design for Good Initiative Gets Real Results
process.description: We've cut the fluff from the design process, squaring down to three no-drama steps — perfect for teams on a mission with more dreams than budget.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: First, we dive deep into your cause, objectives, and community. It’s all about understanding and strategy.

steps.title: Concept Development
steps.description: Next, our creatives roll up their sleeves to craft fresh, bold ideas that echo your mission and goals.

steps.title: Design & Refinement
steps.description: Then, we perfect your visuals, paying close attention to every pixel, and iterating till it’s spot-on.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: Finally, we get your design across the finish line and stand by you to ensure it delivers.

cta.title: Kickstart Your Mission Design Today
cta.subtitle: No contracts. No drama. Just design that’s all in for your cause.
